com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler

Interface PessimisticLockingHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PessimisticLockingViaDb

    public interface PessimisticLockingHandler
    Specifies the interface for locking OIs using pessimistic locking.
    Author:
    DG

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acquireLocks(View view)
      Acquires the pessimistic locks for a view.
      void cleanup()
      Called at the end of activation to release any resources.
      void initialize(ActivateOptions options)
      Performs any initialization necessary for acquiring pessimistic locks.
      void releaseLocks(Collection<View> views)
      Release the pessimistic locks for the views.
      void releaseLocks(View view)
      Release the pessimistic locks for this view.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(ActivateOptions options)
                throws PessimisticLockingException
        Performs any initialization necessary for acquiring pessimistic locks. Called at the beginning of activation.
        Parameters:
        options -
        Throws:
        PessimisticLockingException

      • cleanup

        void cleanup()
        Called at the end of activation to release any resources.

      • acquireLocks

        void acquireLocks(View view)
                  throws PessimisticLockingException
        Acquires the pessimistic locks for a view. This is called after the root entities are loaded.
        Parameters:
        view - View to lock
        Throws:
        PessimisticLockingException

      • releaseLocks

        void releaseLocks(Collection<View> views)
        Release the pessimistic locks for the views. This is called when a view is dropped and is not part of activation.
        Parameters:
        views - List of views to release.

      • releaseLocks

        void releaseLocks(View view)
        Release the pessimistic locks for this view. This is called when a view is dropped and is not part of activation.
        Parameters:
        view -
